clear_brief: Clear the last messages, admins only
clear_description:
Admins can use this command to clear the most recent messages inside a text channel (including the command).
First argument specifies the number of messages, default is 3.
info:
>>> *"Odoaldo, un personaggio particolarmente benvoluto, va in refettorio a mangiare un panino con la mortadella."*

**21 Aprile 2018**
info_description: Shows some more detailed info on the bot, its version, author, repository url, license.
ping_description: Used to get an average of the response time from the bot.
whoami_description: Very simple command replying with a mention for the author of the command.
